name: Werewolf (Lycanthrope)
movement: 30 ft. walking speed, 40 ft. in wolf form
description: A Medium-sized humanoid cursed to transform into a wolf or wolf-hybrid form, characterized by heightened senses, sharp claws, and fangs.
memorable: Known for their bloodlust, ability to transform, and the curse of lycanthropy they inflict.
goals: To hunt and prey on humans and animals as part of a pack.
relations: Often encountered with other lycanthropes or in packs, hunting together.
environment: Typically found in forests or regions where they can hunt effectively.
strengths: Immune to damage from nonmagical attacks and non-silvered weapons, proficient in Stealth and has Pack Tactics for enhanced combat.
weaknesses: Relatively low Armor Class in humanoid form, making it susceptible to focused attacks.
attacks: Can perform Multiattack with either bites or claws, dealing significant damage especially to humanoid targets with the risk of lycanthropy.
most_powerful_ability: Can inflict lycanthropy through their bite, potentially creating more werewolves.
equipment: In humanoid or hybrid form, wields a greatclub in addition to sharp claws and a deadly bite.
senses: Gains advantage on perception checks that rely on hearing or smell due to Keen Hearing and Smell.
skills: Possesses good Stealth skills, making it adept at moving undetected.
additional_information: Can shapeshift between humanoid and wolf forms at will.
Pack Tactics allows for advantage on attacks against targets near allies.
Bloodied Werewolf gains a frenzied bite attack if reduced to half hit points.
Cannot speak while in wolf form, limiting its communication.
Lengthy lore around werewolves and their curse in various cultures.
